TopicTitle: Ive accidentally deleted my mk2 pod

Articles.Content:
You know the large pod could someone pm me a download?

I must of deleted when deleting the empty pods mod.

Grand Lander, re-extract it from your zip, or re-download KSP if you have deleted your zip

We can't give you the files, they are Squads copyright.

Also, the patcher should repair your install.

Just check the recycling bin.

I don't know if you're allowed to send game files

@ sal_vager

I think this is the second time today you've ninja'd me

Edited October 6, 2012 by maxsil

Just check the recycling bin.

I don't know if you're allowed to send game files

@ sal_vager

I think this is the second time today you've ninja'd me

Sorry thats what i thought.

What you mean ninja'd you?
Lol, like a ninja, I slip in and out unseen, leaving comments in my wake
Ninja'd in these forums means someone posted before you did, when it appeared they didn't post before you...when you started commenting.

What?

But he did post before me, granted, only a few seconds, but still, he posted before i did

What?

But he did post before me, granted, only a few seconds, but still, he posted before i did

It's kinda hard to explain...

Is posting a single part file really gonna make a difference? People post parts all the time in the addon forum and it's not like he's going to pirate the game with one part file. Can a moderator please give the final judgement and I'd be glad to upload the part for the OP?

Yes CkGordon, it's not allowed, sorry.

Grand Lander, what exactly is stopping you from repairing KSP with the patcher or downloading a new copy from the store?

This is still fairly on-topic as it is about KSP, Grand Lander, albeit it would be more suited to the support board.

Have you managed to fix your issue yet? If so, I'll leave this thread, if not, I'll move it over to the Support board, where we can continue this discussion.
